column1: # Given a variable V, the following code will compute a variable R
# which keeps the value of V as long as it's in +/-5%, updating when
# it's out of such a boundary.
# This test ensures that any single gap in V will cause R to cease.

program=
   R = DiracDelta[10, Every[1, "DAY_OF_MONTH", "CET"]] + Shift[DiracDelta[-10, Every[1, "DAY_OF_MONTH", "CET"]], -Period[1, "MILLISECOND"]]
